subtitleNullable: contains 449k users, 18k anime and 74 mil. ratings from myanimelist.net
descriptionNullable:
### About
This dataset contains some of the information publicly displayed at https://myanimelist.net. That is information about Anime itself as well as user ratings and user data.


### Content

This dataset contains

- 449 251 users
- 18 353 anime
- 129 419 831 anime list entries
- 74 098 119 of those with a rating

crawled from https://myanimelist.net using https://jikan.moe/ .

The files users.tar.zst and anime.tar.zst contain the API responses from Jikan as json/csv file for each request, everything else in this dataset is derived from these. There has been done no further cleaning or filtering of the data.

### Loading tables

You can either decompress the archives using https://github.com/facebook/zstd or directly read from them with python:
```python
import pandas as pd
import zstandard as zstd

def read_zstd(path: str):
    with open(path, "rb") as f:
        return pd.read_csv(zstd.ZstdDecompressor().stream_reader(f))

df = read_zstd("anime.csv.zst")
```
